name: Back To Village
description:
The game is divided into two modes.
One is the "Small Battle Royale" mode. In this mode, three players form a game of battle. This is a networked game mode. One player creates a room, and other players follow the room with ID, choose to join the corresponding room, and wait for the number of players in a room to reach 3 players, the game will start, and the three players can attack each other at will, and in this scene, there are no monsters, only three player characters, when the player's HP reaches 0, the player will die, and only one player will be left in the end, and the remaining player will be the only winner in the end
The other mode is the mode of "Kill Monsters". In this mode, there is only one player character, which is a stand-alone game. The player can start the game by setting the difficulty of the game and the scene level where the game starts in the setting interface at the beginning. In the scene of the game, There will be a certain number of monsters, and each monster will attack the player, if the player's HP is 0, then the game is over, if the monster's HP is 0, then the monster dies, and the player's killing points increase by 1, and finally At that time, all points obtained by the player in this process will be counted.

Discord: https://discord.gg/wk7GGGmA
